content.heroIntro: Welcome to EDIFICIO CIRENA, an exceptional residential development by URMOSA located in the charming Pueblo area of Hondón de las Nieves, Alicante. This premium project features thoughtfully designed apartments ranging from 1 to 3 bedrooms, starting from just €175,000, offering outstanding value in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. With completion scheduled for May 1st, 2026, EDIFICIO CIRENA represents a unique opportunity to own a modern home in a region experiencing consistent 8% year-on-year property appreciation. The development combines contemporary architecture with practical amenities, including a private swimming pool, air conditioning pre-installation, and secure parking spaces. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, investment opportunity, or permanent residence, EDIFICIO CIRENA delivers the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle, accessibility to world-class amenities, and exceptional value. The established international community in Hondón de las Nieves ensures English is commonly spoken, making this an ideal choice for expatriates looking to invest in Spanish property with confidence.

locationSection.intro: Hondón de las Nieves is a picturesque pueblo in inland Alicante, renowned for its authentic Spanish charm, welcoming atmosphere, and thriving international community. Located strategically between the Mediterranean coast and the Penibético mountains, this charming town offers the perfect balance of rural tranquility and modern convenience. The area has become increasingly popular with property buyers seeking value without sacrificing lifestyle quality. Hondón de las Nieves boasts excellent healthcare facilities, quality education options including international schools, and a vibrant mix of local and international restaurants. The established expat population means English is widely spoken, and the cost of living remains considerably lower than coastal alternatives. With Multiple Blue Flag beaches accessible within 20 minutes and several championship golf courses nearby, residents enjoy both relaxation and recreational activities. The region is also known for its local markets, traditional Spanish culture, and welcoming community spirit that makes settling in straightforward and enjoyable.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without requiring Spanish citizenship or residency. You will need an NIE (Spanish tax identification number) for the purchase process. Many international buyers have successfully purchased properties in Hondón de las Nieves. We can assist with legal documentation and the purchase process.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, typical costs include: Property Transfer Tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), land registry fees (0.1%), and real estate agent commission (typically 5%). After purchase, annual costs include IBI property tax (0.4-1.1% of cadastral value) and community fees. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for each property.
